name: Died Hard
description:
The idea is that you are a member of a robbery and after questioning the leader you are thrown out the window of the top floor of the building and die.
You are rejected from heaven and must redeem yourself by saving the hostages.

Use [A] or [Left Arrow] to move left, [D] or [Right Arrow] to move right, and use the [Space bar] to interact.

I ran out of time trying to include the UI helper for possessing the robbers, but the rule is they must be asleep or unconscious to be possessed, and it only lasts 5secs. 

I also did create a dialogue system to use to add some more story but ran out of time before I could implement it, I was going to use this to make a few jokes about the fact that this ghost can't actually go through walls and doors.
